## Vote
I am requesting a vote to ...

Do you approve ... ?

## Reactions
- 👍 Approve
- 👎 Deny (please add comment explaining why)
- 👀 Abstain (please add comment explaining why)

## Due to
I'd ask you to cast your vote with 72h (3 days).

## Binding votes
- @person1
- @person2
- @person3
- @person4
